Package data

Class Database_Query_Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.Database_Query_Generator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryRandomPattern, Cycle_HeavyLightPattern
    public abstract class Database_Query_Generator
extends Object
    Abstract class for a synthetic data generator. Produces a list of database relations. The generated database can be accessed by the getter method get_database() or written to an output stream by print_database(). For specific queries and patterns, subclasses need to implement populate_database() appropriately.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected List<Relation> database
      The generated database as a list of relations.
      protected int l
      The number of relations in the database.
      protected List<Integer> n_list
      The sizes of the relations of the database.
      protected PrintStream out
      An output stream where the database can be written to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Database_Query_Generator​(int n, int l)
      Constructor for when all the relations have the same size n.
      Database_Query_Generator​(List<Integer> n_list, int l)
      Constructor that allows for a different size per relation.

        Parameters:
